clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
Session may update the Terms at any time.
When We update our Terms, We will update the “Last Modified” date associated with the updated Terms

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We may modify, suspend, or terminate your access to or use of our Services anytime for any reason, such as if you violate the letter or spirit of our Terms or create harm, risk, or possible legal exposure for Session.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (Australia)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: The laws of Australia govern our Terms

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to $10
clauses.clause_text: OUR AGGREGATE LIABILITY RELATING TO, ARISING OUT OF, OR IN ANY WAY IN CONNECTION WITH OUR TERMS, US, OR OUR SERVICES WILL NOT EXCEED TEN DOLLARS ($10).

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: The Session app does not collect or share your information.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text: so all information is deleted within 6 months of being collected.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: All the data we do collect is to help improve the website, and anything older than this is unlikely to be useful, so it is deleted.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that only keep the strictly necessary logs on their servers and therefore protect your privacy.
clauses.clause_text: We don’t want to collect or store any of your information that isn’t strictly necessary,

case.text: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: You own the information you submit through our Services.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.
clauses.clause_text: (“Session”, “We”) utilizes state-of-the-art security and end-to-end encryption to provide private messaging and other services to users worldwide.

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: We do not share or sell any data we collect on the Session website with third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: This service does not force users into binding arbitration
clauses.description: Binding Arbitration is a dispute resolution method involving a neutral third party which will render a decision instead of going to court. Since the arbitrator can decide the outgoing of a dispute without evidences or a legal basis, it is preferable that users decide whether they want or not their dispute to be resolved this way.
clauses.clause_text: You also agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of such courts for the purpose of litigating all such disputes.

case.text: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access
clauses.description: This is different from disclaiming liability for external links, which is handled by the "This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites" case.
clauses.clause_text:
If you’re planning to use Session on mobile, it’s worth reading Apple or Google’s privacy policies.
If you’re using iOS, check out Apple’s App Store Review Guidelines.
For Android, read the User Data section of Google’s Developer Policy Center.

case.text: You are warned of the potential consequences related to third-party access

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: Information we do collect

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text: You don’t need a phone number, e-mail, or any information tied to your real identity to make a Session account.

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: THE SESSION PARTIES WILL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY LOST PROFITS OR CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, INDIRECT, OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES RELATING TO, ARISING OUT OF, OR IN ANY WAY IN CONNECTION WITH OUR TERMS, US, OR OUR SERVICES, EVEN IF THE SESSION PARTIES HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: We may discontinue some or all of our Services, including certain features and the support for certain devices and platforms, at any time.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
clauses.clause_text:
WE DO NOT CONTROL, AND ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR, CONTROLLING HOW OR WHEN OUR USERS USE OUR SERVICES.
WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE ACTIONS OR INFORMATION (INCLUDING CONTENT) OF OUR USERS OR OTHER THIRD PARTIES.

case.text: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: Our Services may be interrupted, including for maintenance, upgrades, or network or equipment failures.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text:
YOU USE OUR SERVICES AT YOUR OWN RISK AND SUBJECT TO THE FOLLOWING DISCLAIMERS.
WE PROVIDE OUR SERVICES ON AN “AS IS” BASIS

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: For example you must not (a) gain or try to gain unauthorized access to our Services or systems.

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
You must be at least 13 years old to use our Services.
The minimum age to use our Services without parental approval may be higher in your country of residence.</

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: You agree to use our Services only for legal, authorized, and acceptable purposes.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text: WITHOUT ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location Victoria, Australia
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: You agree to resolve any Claim you have with us relating to or arising out of our Terms, us, or our Services exclusively in the state of Victoria, Australia.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
